skillTree.name: Clan-Mother
skillTree.description: As the most powerful magic user among her kind, the Meargh leads her clan with strength and wisdom.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +2 for Fimir units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +2 for Fimir units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Fimir units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Fimir units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Dirach
skillTree.description: The lesser sorcerers that accompany the Meargh are useful, bolstering her own strength and giving her greater clout.

effects.description:
Hero recruit rank: +1 for Fimir Balefiends
	(local province)

Recruit rank: +1 for Fimir units
	(Lord's army)

Hero recruit rank: +2 for Fimir Balefiends
	(local province)

Recruit rank: +2 for Fimir units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Fimir Talismans
skillTree.description: Cursed idols and ancient relics are carried with the Fimir warband for protection and good fortune.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%

Enemy Hero action success chance: -2%
	(Heroes in local province)

Enemy casualty replenishment rate: -2%
	(local enemy armies)
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +20%

Enemy Hero action success chance: -4%
	(Heroes in local province)

Enemy casualty replenishment rate: -4%
	(local enemy armies)

skillTree.name: Honoured Ancients
skillTree.description: Long ago, the Fimir and Giants enjoyed power and prosperity in equal measure.

effects.description:
Leadership: +2 for Fimir units
	(all armies factionwide)

Melee attack: +1 for Norscan Giant units
	(all armies factionwide)

Melee defence: +1 for Norscan Giant units
	(all armies factionwide)

skillTree.name: Miasma
skillTree.description: A shroud of mist hides away their settlements and protects the Fimir from the accursed sunlight.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +15% for Lords
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in battle, this Lord will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Voice of the Dark Gods
skillTree.description: This Lord speaks with a dread booming voice - a gift from his Dark Masters to ensure obedience.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Thick-Skinned
skillTree.description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Quicksilver
skillTree.description: Blink and you die.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

skillTree.name: Melkoth's Mystifying Miasma
skillTree.description: The caster weaves a confounding fog that numbs and deludes enemies, causing them to stumble and stagger.

skillTree.name: The Enfeebling Foe
skillTree.description: When cast this spell enfeebles enemy minds; they feel the crushing weight of reality bearing down upon them.

Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Enfeebling Foe Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -10% for "The Enfeebling Foe Upgraded"

skillTree.name: The Withering
skillTree.description: The Wizard destroys their enemies from within, corroding foes' minds with doubt and crisis.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "The Withering"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Withering Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -10% for "The Withering Upgraded"

skillTree.name: The Penumbral Pendulum
skillTree.description: A spectral pendulum is summoned by the Wizard. On command, it swings, razor sharp and with lethal speed, through the foe.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Penumbral Pendulum"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "The Penumbral Pendulum Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -10% for "The Penumbral Pendulum Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Smoke & Mirrors
skillTree.description: A conjured shadow is just as obfuscating as a real one - the Shadow Wizard is master or mistress of the 'concealing' arts.

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

skillTree.name: Pit of Shades
skillTree.description: The spellcaster opens a vortex leading into the Pit. Anything caught within it will be lost forever.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Pit of Shades"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Pit of Shades Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Okkam's Mindrazor
skillTree.description: The supernatural solution is often the best; weapons materialise before the caster's allies, allowing them to slice through flesh, soul, and consciousness.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Okkam's Mindrazor"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Okkam's Mindrazor Upgraded"

Winds of Magic cost: -1 for all spells

ui_effects.description: ➕ Improves power recharge rate by 1 every 7 seconds

skillTree.name: Dominating Presence
skillTree.description: A Chaos Lord dominates – lesser beings cringe from a being that is so intently under scrutiny from the Dark Gods.

skillTree.name: Fearsome Warriors
skillTree.description: Those who do not bend the knee to the Gods of the North soon find all they hold dear obliterated before them.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +2 for Marauders, Marauder Spearmen, Marauder Berserkers, Ulfhednar, Huscarls and Marauder Champions units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Beast Slayers
skillTree.description: Delighting in death and suffering, these savage warriors follow their ignoble Lord wherever he goes.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +3% for Marauder Hunters, Marauder Horsemen, Whalers and Marauder Horsemasters units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +10% for Marauder Hunters, Marauder Horsemen, Whalers and Marauder Horsemasters units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +10% for Marauder Hunters, Marauder Horsemen, Whalers and Marauder Horsemasters units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Unnatural Selection
skillTree.description: Only the fiercest creatures can survive the frozen north; the strongest are rounded up for war and starved into viciousness, ready for the next battle.

effects.description:
Speed: +5% for Norscan Warhounds, Norscan Ice Wolves, and Marauder Chariots units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +10% for Norscan Warhounds, Norscan Ice Wolves, and Marauder Chariots units

	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +20 for Norscan Warhounds, Norscan Ice Wolves, and Marauder Chariots units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Frostbitten
skillTree.description: The intense cold cuts into the flesh, burning the foe's extremities until they drop off altogether!

effects.description:
Melee attack: +2 for Skin Wolves, Norscan Trolls, and Norscan Ice Trolls units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +5% for Skin Wolves, Norscan Trolls, and Norscan Ice Trolls units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Skin Wolves, Norscan Trolls, and Norscan Ice Trolls units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Hail of Teeth
skillTree.description: The razor-sharp hail of the north is not the only danger in the Norscan sky – its airborne beasts are just as deadly and far less predictable.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +2 for Manticore and Frost Wyrm units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Manticore and Frost Wyrm units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +6 for Manticore and Frost Wyrm units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Armour: +12 for Manticore and Frost Wyrm units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Monsters of the North
skillTree.description: Giant, deadly, and able to take orders, this Lord’s monstrosities are especially terrifying and lethal.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +2 for Fimir, Norscan Giant, Feral Mammoth, and War Mammoth units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Fimir, Norscan Giant, Feral Mammoth, and War Mammoth units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Champions of the North
skillTree.description: In spite of their savage nature, they are possessed of a savage code of conduct and form a loose brotherhood of those considered worthy.

effects.description:
Physical resistance: 10% for Marauders, Marauder Spearmen, Marauder Berserkers, Ulfhednar, Huscarls and Marauder Champions units (Rank 7 and above)

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Hardened Hunters
skillTree.description: No beast too large, no adversary too great; no quarry - mortal or otherwise - can evade them.

effects.description:
Missile resistance: 15% for Marauder Hunters, Marauder Horsemen, Whalers and Marauder Horsemasters units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +10% for Marauder Hunters, Marauder Horsemen, Whalers and Marauder Horsemasters units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for Marauder Hunters, Marauder Horsemen, Whalers and Marauder Horsemasters units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Icy Wrath
skillTree.description: The intense cold and near-constant darkness of the far north make for a certain kind of killer.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% for Norscan Warhounds, Norscan Ice Wolves, Manticore, Skin Wolves, and Marauder Chariots units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for Norscan Warhounds, Norscan Ice Wolves, Manticore, Skin Wolves, and Marauder Chariots units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +15 for Norscan Warhounds, Norscan Ice Wolves, Manticore, Skin Wolves, and Marauder Chariots units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Hulks of Death
skillTree.description: The freezing darkness and stunning violence of the far north bring no small solace to those who have lost everything and wish to forget.

effects.description:
Armour: +12 for Norscan Trolls, Norscan Ice Trolls, Frost Wyrm, Manticores, Norscan Giant, Fimir, Feral Mammoth, and War Mammoth (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Ward save: +5% for Norscan Trolls, Norscan Ice Trolls, Frost Wyrm, Manticores, Norscan Giant, Fimir, Feral Mammoth, and War Mammoth (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Norscan Trolls, Norscan Ice Trolls, Frost Wyrm, Manticores, Norscan Giant, Fimir, Feral Mammoth, and War Mammoth (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Stand or Die!
skillTree.description: There can be no turning back for those whose souls are turning black.

skillTree.name: Fight or Die!
skillTree.description: There is no other choice. There never was.

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Takers of All
skillTree.description: That which is not offered up to the Dark Gods of the North in tribute is harvested by their servants for their own petty gain.

skillTree.name: Serve or Die
skillTree.description: "You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +25
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -5% for all units
	(Lord's army)

Unit experience gain per turn: +50
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -10% for all units
	(Lord's army)

Unit experience gain per turn: +100
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -20% for all units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Norse Resilience
skillTree.description: The bleak, brutal landscape of the far north breeds bloody, warlike tribes in thrall to Chaos' delicious, twisted power.

skillTree.name: Ruination
skillTree.description: "This stinking mortal Hold will fall, my masters have foreseen it. Bring them ruin!"

effects.description:
Attrition suffered by defender: +10% when laying siege
	(local region)

Attrition suffered by defender: +20% when laying siege
	(local region)

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Infamous Raider
skillTree.description: If there were annals detailing the dastardly deeds of the sackers and looters of the world, this inveterate brigand would feature heavily.

skillTree.name: Savage Skills
skillTree.description: There's something about the harsh, unforgiving nature of northern life that makes its occupants fight harder and longer than many of their soft, southern equivalents.

skillTree.name: Unnatural Healing
skillTree.description: Something strange - something no scholar really wishes to discover - governs who dies and who lives in the warlike northern wastes.

skillTree.name: Fuelled by War
skillTree.description: War and glory before the Gods are the determining elements in every decision made; there is nothing else worth living - or dying - for.

skillTree.name: Spawn of Chaos
skillTree.description: The tendrils (and tentacles!) of the Northern Gods reach down from the poles and far across the world, twisting and corrupting all they touch.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +250
	(Lord's army)
Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.name: Maintenance
skillTree.description: FACTIONWIDE: all source of income: -0,5% and characters upkeep: +1%. Effects are additive. Negated on level 30 of character.

backgroundSkills.name: Arrogant
backgroundSkills.description: It's not just the Elves that suffer from this affliction then?

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 for Marauder Berserker units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Blind
backgroundSkills.description: Although the eyes do not see, the other senses remain open.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -10% for Lords and Heroes
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Blood Feud
backgroundSkills.description: Only the blood of the wretch will settle this.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +10% for all Marauder Chariot & Marauder Cavalry units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Boring
backgroundSkills.description: "Another speech? Very well… does it have to be so… lengthy?"

backgroundSkills.name: Charismatic
backgroundSkills.description: "We stand together! I promise I will not leave your side, brothers! Will you join me?"

backgroundSkills.name: Choleric
backgroundSkills.description: Does a rage as hot as Khorne's burn within?

backgroundSkills.name: Clumsy
backgroundSkills.description: There are drunk Ogres more sure-footed than this one.

backgroundSkills.name: Misshapen
backgroundSkills.description: Deformed by birth or made by the Ruinous Powers, yet there is honour within the prison of flesh.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +5 for all Skin Wolves units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Easily Deceived
backgroundSkills.description: "Tzeentch will have so much fun with you, puppet!"

effects.description:
Armour: +10 for Marauder Infantry units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Easily Distracted
backgroundSkills.description: "Look! Over there - a Snotling showing its arse!"

effects.description:
Melee attack: +10 for Marauder Berserker units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Easily Trapped
backgroundSkills.description: To trap a fool is easy; to trap a King… perhaps even easier.

Melee attack: +10 for Norscan Giant units
	(all units in army)

	(all units in army)

Ambush defence chance: +10%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Handsome
backgroundSkills.description: Such chiselled good looks belie a confidence that a homely face cannot parse.

backgroundSkills.name: Honourable
backgroundSkills.description: Honour is everything!

backgroundSkills.name: Humble
backgroundSkills.description: A humble creature, shamed by praise and thoughtful in their dealings.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -10% for Marauder units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Intelligent
backgroundSkills.description: In this age of blood and battle, intellect is an underrated gift.

	(all units in army)

	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Irresolute
backgroundSkills.description: "To be crippled by indecision is to give your enemies an advantage."

	(all units in army)

	(local region)

backgroundSkills.name: Magnanimous
backgroundSkills.description: "This victory is not mine alone, we all share in the glory."

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +15 for Frost-Wyrm units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Maimed Arm
backgroundSkills.description: "This one is armless, sir."

backgroundSkills.name: Maimed Leg
backgroundSkills.description: "No, not drunk, just legless."

Weapon strength: +10% for all Marauder Cavalry units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Melancholic
backgroundSkills.description: "Why forlorn? Are you not a King, an Emperor - a champion?"

backgroundSkills.name: Military Heritage
backgroundSkills.description: Born in battle, dragged up in war.

backgroundSkills.description: A calming presence can be a steadying hand… but also disquieting.

	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Sanguine
backgroundSkills.description: An assured air instils great confidence in your followers.

	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Disfiguring Scar
backgroundSkills.description: Such an ugly scar is always memorable.

	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Distinguishing Scar
backgroundSkills.description: Clearly a veteran of some heroic deed.

backgroundSkills.name: Sneaky
backgroundSkills.description: Skulk and sneak or shadow and stalk, theirs is a guileful nature.

backgroundSkills.name: Spurned
backgroundSkills.description: Spurned by his allies, this man will struggle to regain favour.

backgroundSkills.name: Stupid
backgroundSkills.description: Shares the intellect of a River Troll.

backgroundSkills.name: Ugly
backgroundSkills.description: One of the Plague Father's creations perhaps?

	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Uncompromising
backgroundSkills.description: Others may call it decisive, but being uncompromising can be a weakness as well as a strength.
